item.name: Recipe Builder
item.description: Specific to recipe builder; submission uses standard recipe calls.

request.description: Posting a json object of params to that will return a recipe but does not actually insert yet. In the body, runner is required, the rest depend on the params for that specific runner as determined by its blueprint. To actually add the recipe, refer to the standard "recipe" api.
